short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help getting actual video URLs if you wish to play them in VLC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help getting actual video URLs if you wish to play them in VLC. Just click the Chrome menu icon of the extension, and you will get the actual video URL of the video content. Just copy it, and paste in "Media->Open Network Stream" in VLC media player, and watch your favourite online shows/live events online.
